meaningMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an い on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>dilute</kanji>? It's <vocabulary>dilute</vocabulary>. And something that's been diluted is now <vocabulary>thin</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This drink is way too <vocabulary>dilute</vocabulary>d. <reading>You sue</reading> (うす) the makers for their thin drink.
